content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

**1. What is the Current Market Regime?**
RISK-ON: Low volatility (Vol: 17.1%) with full-sector participation (Breadth: 8/8) — broad-based bull momentum confirmed.

**2. Which sectors are leading?**
Construction & REIT and Banking & Finance are leading, driven by ENKAI (1W: +14.04% | 1M: +20.36%) ABOVE TREND and ISCTR (1W: +16.09% | 1M: +21.33%) ABOVE TREND.

**3. Which sectors are lagging?**
Energy & Chemicals and Technology & Telecom lag relative to leaders despite gains; PETKM (1W: +2.45% | 1M: +9.99%) ABOVE TREND and KONTR (1W: -0.62% | 1M: -15.40%) BELOW TREND highlight dispersion.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

**4. Top Performing Stocks?**
ISCTR (1W: +16.09% | 1M: +21.33%) ABOVE TREND, ENKAI (1W: +14.04% | 1M: +20.36%) ABOVE TREND, SISE (1W: +13.69% | 1M: +16.97%) ABOVE TREND, AEFES (1W: +12.96% | 1M: +25.05%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +12.24% | 1M: +11.26%) ABOVE TREND.

**5. Worst Performing Stocks?**
PETKM (1W: +2.45% | 1M: +9.99%) ABOVE TREND, ALARK (1W: +2.44% | 1M: +4.30%) ABOVE TREND, CCOLA (1W: +1.92% | 1M: +21.24%) ABOVE TREND, HEKTS (1W: +0.92% | 1M: +4.43%) ABOVE TREND, OYAKC (1W: -0.15% | 1M: +14.93%) CORRECTION.

**6. Momentum Stocks?**
Top 1W movers: ISCTR (1W: +16.09% | 1M: +21.33%) ABOVE TREND, ENKAI (1W: +14.04% | 1M: +20.36%) ABOVE TREND, SISE (1W: +13.69% | 1M: +16.97%) ABOVE TREND, AEFES (1W: +12.96% | 1M: +25.05%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +12.24% | 1M: +11.26%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

**7. Banking Sector Outlook?**
Banking is the market engine — ISCTR (1W: +16.09% | 1M: +21.33%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +10.56% | 1M: +20.15%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +10.76% | 1M: +7.11%) ABOVE TREND; watch HALKB (1W: -4.59% | 1M: +12.30%) CORRECTION as a short-term weakness within the group.

**8. Industrial Sector Outlook?**
Heavy industry showing broad gains but with rotation — EREGL (1W: +4.81% | 1M: +17.29%) ABOVE TREND, FROTO (1W: +6.68% | 1M: +21.10%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: -4.43% | 1M: +23.65%) CORRECTION; selectively add on pullbacks.

**9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?**
Energy posting the weakest sector return despite pockets of strength: TUPRS (1W: +2.99% | 1M: +21.31%) ABOVE TREND, SISE (1W: +13.69% | 1M: +16.97%) ABOVE TREND, TRALT (1W: -8.51% | 1M: +12.63%) CORRECTION — monitor commodity moves and FX sensitivity.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

**10. Portfolio Recommendation?**
Risk-on stance: overweight Banking, Construction & REIT and Retail; add selective Energy and Heavy Industry names on dips; trim highly extended winners and reduce exposure to KONTR (1W: -0.62% | 1M: -15.40%) BELOW TREND and other single-stock froth.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

**11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?**
ISCTR (1W: +16.09% | 1M: +21.33%) ABOVE TREND, ENKAI (1W: +14.04% | 1M: +20.36%) ABOVE TREND, SISE (1W: +13.69% | 1M: +16.97%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +10.56% | 1M: +20.15%) ABOVE TREND, KONTR (1W: -0.62% | 1M: -15.40%) BELOW TREND.

**12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?**
Construction & REIT, Banking & Finance, and Retail & Food for leadership continuation and earnings/flows.

**13. Key Levels & Triggers?**
Watch XU100 for continuation above recent highs (breakout confirmation) and keep pullback support near the short-term 20-day range; catalysts: CBRT communications, Q4 bank revisions, global risk appetite and oil price moves.

## EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

Low-volatility, full-participation RISK-ON market with banks, construction and retail leading; top longs include ISCTR, ENKAI and SISE. Main risk is profit-taking in stretched names and idiosyncratic corrections (KONTR, ASELS, HALKB) — favor selective adds on dips and trim excess exposure.
